text: Mahamudu Bawumia (born 7 October 1963) is a Ghanaian politician and former central banker. He was the fifth vice president of Ghana from 2017 to 2025. Bawumia was the unsuccessful New Patriotic Party (NPP) nominee for president in the 2024 general election. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Ghana Category:Economists
title: Mahamudu Bawumia
